title: Feature request: Cloud providers support or multiple user access to configuration
author: lebe-dev
body_snippet:
Would be great to support DropBox and other cloud providers just on file system level. Or support multiple access to configuration.

In my case i use mRemoteNG on more than one OS and save configuration to dropbox
If i save config on one system then save on second system it will be overwritten. All changes will be lost.

comments.author: marclaporte
comments.snippet:
I would like to use with https://syncthing.net/ so information is synced between my devices, and never on the cloud.

Also, KeePass 2.x features a built-in synchronization mechanism:
http://keepass.info/help/v2/sync.html

comments.author: LewkDo
comments.snippet: Something like KeePass file-synchronization would be really helpful. We use mRemoteNG in a project with multiple people, we never save password in configuration-file, but we add servers to shared configuration file often.
